pages.text: The $(item)Backpack$(), is... a $(item)Backpack$(). It can be equipped to the back slot in the curios inventory by clicking the circular icon in the top left of your character portrait in the inventory.$(br2)Once it is equipped, you can access the $(item)Backpack$() by pressing the B key.

The $(item)Backpack$() comes with 9 slots, but you can craft higher tier $(item)Backpacks$() with more rows of storage. Try searching "@backpack" in the JEI search bar, and clicking on the other $(item)Backpacks$() to see the recipes.
